title: Evaluation of Drug Interactions in the setting of THerapy combinations
text: EDITH package enables synergistic effects two three drugs explored, based cell viability data obtained combination experiments.

title: Evaluation of Drug Interactions in the setting of THerapy combinations
code: if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) {     install.packages("devtools") }  if (!requireNamespace("ComplexHeatmap", quietly = TRUE)) {     if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) {         install.packages("BiocManager")     }     BiocManager::install("ComplexHeatmap") }  devtools::install_github("mathilde-robin/EDITH")

title: Evaluation of Drug Interactions in the setting of THerapy combinations
text: EDITH can explore synergistic effects two three drugs based cell viability data obtained combination experiments. input data provided specific format, described package documentation. Example datasets included package illustrate required format (inst/extdata/2drugs.xlsx inst/extdata/3drugs.xlsx). snapshot input data format two drugs: FIGURE

title: Evaluation of Drug Interactions in the setting of THerapy combinations
text: EDITH --one function performs entire analysis pipeline, data preprocessing visualization results. run_EDITH() function detects whether input data corresponds two-drug three-drug combination applies appropriate analysis methods accordingly. input file path specified via pop-window function executed.

title: Evaluation of Drug Interactions in the setting of THerapy combinations
text: main outputs EDITH package include: Heatmaps visualizing viability data across different drug concentration combinations, Heatmaps visualizing expected viability based Bliss independence model, Heatmaps visualizing interaction effect, Summary tables detailing additive, combination efficacy indexes. example heatmaps generated EDITH two-drug combinations: FIGURE

title: Evaluation of Drug Interactions in the setting of THerapy combinations
text: full package documentation available . initial development package motivated work Tosi et al., BMC Cancer, 2018.

code: save_perm_3drugs(sheet_name, rep, perm, drug_doses, drug_names, global)

title: Save permutation results for 3-drug combinations. â€” save_perm_3drugs
text: sheet_name name sheet processed. rep numeric value indicating replicate number. perm numeric value indicating permutation number. drug_doses list numeric vectors doses drug. drug_names list element name corresponding drug. global list element corresponds replicate contains: data_init: Numeric matrix/array response values data_bliss: Numeric matrix/array Bliss expected response value index_list: List calculated indexes: Additivity Index (AI), Combination Index (CI), Efficacy Index (EI) heatmap_init: ComplexHeatmap object initial data heatmap_bliss: ComplexHeatmap object Bliss expected data heatmap_diff: ComplexHeatmap object difference Bliss expected initial data
